pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: お客様の今後の購買需要を明らかにしようとしています。
lessons.english: We are trying to clarify your future procurement requirements.

lessons.japanese: 購買部の者に会われたほうがいいと思います。
lessons.english: I think you should probably see someone from Purchasing.

lessons.japanese: 購買部にとって重要な人材になられると思います。
lessons.english: She will be an asset to the Purchasing Department.
